</comment>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50428] Unable to find a suspected dropout student for Attendance Form B at Attendance > Suspected Dropout > Return of Suspected Dropout.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50428</link>
<description>
Unable to find a suspected dropout student for Attendance Form B at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Return of Suspected Dropout.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103688">WPSII-50428</key>
<summary>
Unable to find a suspected dropout student for Attendance Form B at Attendance > Suspected Dropout > Return of Suspected Dropout.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="3">Medium</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Thu, 15 Mar 2018 11:16:49 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 15 Mar 2018 12:31:06 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 15 Mar 2018 12:21:23 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> Affected Student Info: - <br/> Reg No.: A6118 <br/> Class Name: 2D (??) <br/> Class No.: 5 <br/> The last absent days: From 26-Feb-2018 to 7-Mar-2018 <br/> Return Date: 8-Mar-2018
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 15 Mar 2018 12:31:06 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> No Attendance Form A of this student found in the school's WebSAMS and make sure the user has never submitted it. Thus she cannot find her at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Return of Suspected Dropout. However, the student has returned to the school on 8-Mar. The user cannot submit Attendance Form A for the last absent period now unless she changed the system clock of WebSAMS Server. We suggested her to consult the EDB Officer of NACT.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50427] Unable to show Annual score of current school year S6 students on the report [R-ASR054] at [S-ASR35-01] Assessment > Report > [R-ASR054]
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50427</link>
<description>
Unable to show Annual score of current school year S6 students on the report [R-ASR054] at [S-ASR35-01] Assessment &gt; Report &gt; [R-ASR054]
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103687">WPSII-50427</key>
<summary>
Unable to show Annual score of current school year S6 students on the report [R-ASR054] at [S-ASR35-01] Assessment > Report > [R-ASR054]
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Thu, 15 Mar 2018 11:09:05 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 15 Mar 2018 13:29:45 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Thu, 15 Mar 2018 13:18:31 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> We suggest user to consolidate the Annual score at [S-ASR33-01] Assessment &gt; Consolidation &gt; Consolidate Score
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50422] Pop-up "E-40181 : STRN is duplicate" is displayed when user amend an STRN for a student in Student > Profile > Particulars.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50422</link>
<description>

</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103682">WPSII-50422</key>

<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Thu, 15 Mar 2018 10:17:46 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 15 Mar 2018 10:24:00 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Thu, 15 Mar 2018 10:23:47 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> Guided user to select &quot;All&quot; in &quot;School year&quot; in Student &gt; Profile &gt; Search Student to search the STRN. It should display the duplicate student. Edit the old student profile with dummy HKID and the new student profile can update with real HKID.
</comment>
</comments>

</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50419</link>
<description>
What the different between input &quot;+&quot; and &quot;-&quot; at Assessment &gt; Data Entry &gt; Capture Subject Score and Grade
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103679">WPSII-50419</key>

</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>

<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Thu, 15 Mar 2018 09:17:52 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> Informed user &quot;+&quot; will consider term weighting for that term and &quot;-&quot; wil not lconsider term weighting
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50417] No HKDSE subject can be found at SLP > JUPAS Application > School Reference Report > Gen Academic Performance Info.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50417</link>
<description>
No HKDSE subject can be found at SLP &gt; JUPAS Application &gt; School Reference Report &gt; Gen Academic Performance Info.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103676">WPSII-50417</key>
<summary>
No HKDSE subject can be found at SLP > JUPAS Application > School Reference Report > Gen Academic Performance Info.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Wed, 14 Mar 2018 16:29:25 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 15 Mar 2018 11:58:02 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SLP</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Wed, 14 Mar 2018 16:36:43 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> We explained to the user that he has not imported the HKDSE subject code file to WebSAMS at &quot;SLP &gt; JUPAS Application &gt; Import Data File&quot; which is downloaded from JUPAS Portal.
</comment>
<comment author="agent15" created="Thu, 15 Mar 2018 11:57:31 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> User still cannot find DSE subject, we guided the user to delete these subjects at &quot;SLP &gt; JUPAS Application &gt; School Reference Report &gt; Academic Performance (Add Subjects)&quot; which were he wanted to find and it will show in funtion &quot;Gen Academic Performance Info&quot;
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50416] Appeared an error message "E-42082 : Selected student is not absent on his(her) latest attendance day / The absent reason of the selected student does not account for suspected dropout." after the user clicked the Reg No. of the suspected dropout ...
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50416</link>
<description>
Appeared an error message &quot;E-42082 : Selected student is not absent on his(her) latest attendance day / The absent reason of the selected student does not account for suspected dropout.&quot; after the user clicked the Reg No. of the suspected dropout student at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [Add] &gt; [Search].
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103675">WPSII-50416</key>
<summary>
Appeared an error message "E-42082 : Selected student is not absent on his(her) latest attendance day / The absent reason of the selected student does not account for suspected dropout." after the user clicked the Reg No. of the suspected dropout ...
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 14 Mar 2018 16:01:58 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 14 Mar 2018 18:32:39 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 14 Mar 2018 18:32:39 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We guided the user to change the Suspected Dropout Indicator of the specific absent reason from &quot;N&quot; to &quot;Y&quot; and saved it at Code Management &gt; Maintenance &gt; Absent Reason. Then he can fill in the information of Form A at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout, click the &quot;Send Data to CDS&quot; button, prepare and confirm it. And then encrypt and send it out to EDB at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50412] A user has a hard-copy of a report from a teacher. Which report can find it in WebSAMS that is about assessment configuration?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50412</link>
<description>
A user has a hard-copy of a report from a teacher. Which report can find it in WebSAMS that is about assessment configuration?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103671">WPSII-50412</key>
<summary>
A user has a hard-copy of a report from a teacher. Which report can find it in WebSAMS that is about assessment configuration?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 14 Mar 2018 15:14:45 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 15 Mar 2018 12:37:15 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 14 Mar 2018 16:53:21 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested that the user can consult the teacher who sent to him. Or send it to us for checking.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 15 Mar 2018 11:55:12 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We received the screen capture of the hard-copy report from the user.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 15 Mar 2018 12:04:41 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> In according to the screen capture, it should be a school-defined report card. The user can find it at &quot;Assessment &gt; Report &gt; {7. Report Cards / 8. Report Card P} &gt; [Search]&quot;. If he still cannot find it, he should consult the teacher.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 15 Mar 2018 12:05:09 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> Unable to contact the user. To leave the above comment to him.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 15 Mar 2018 12:05:32 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied the above comment to the user again.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50410] How to handle the Security Check Summary Report in the Announcement after the user logged on WebSAMS?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50410</link>
<description>
How to handle the Security Check Summary Report in the Announcement after the user logged on WebSAMS?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103669">WPSII-50410</key>
<summary>
How to handle the Security Check Summary Report in the Announcement after the user logged on WebSAMS?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 14 Mar 2018 14:50:58 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 14 Mar 2018 15:26:47 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SEC</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 14 Mar 2018 15:26:47 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to open the exception report after he clicks the hyperlink of Security Check Summary Report. Then he can follow the Remedy Action in the sheet of &quot;Details&quot; of the exception report. Or he can open it at Security &gt; Security Check &gt; [Report Repository]. And we remind him that he can enter the IP address of WebSAMS Server for the connecting NAS to the field of &quot;IP Address for connecting NAS&quot;, enter the Name of Windows Firewall Rule for WebSAMS and save it at Security &gt; Security Check.
</comment>
</comments>

</comment>

</summary>

<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 16:33:29 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 14 Mar 2018 11:40:46 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>HSE</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 16:40:12 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested that the user can find all absent reason codes at Code Management &gt; Maintenance &gt; Absent Reason.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 14 Mar 2018 11:40:46 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied the above comment to the user again. And reminded him that the code table is &quot;Absent Reason&quot; instead of &quot;Absent Reason for Suspected Dropout&quot;.
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50393] Unable to find the function in the WebSAMS left menu at "Data Management > Extract for SOP" on an ITED wokrstation.
</title>

<description>

</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103651">WPSII-50393</key>
<summary>
Unable to find the function in the WebSAMS left menu at "Data Management > Extract for SOP" on an ITED wokrstation.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 15:32:57 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 15:52:07 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SEC</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 15:52:07 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested that the user can grant the function access right at &quot;Security &gt; Access Control &gt; Location Access Control &gt; Data Management&quot; because his machine is out of WebSAMS LAN segment. The access right will be effective on the next time he will log on WebSAMS.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50388] How to plan new school year in Websams?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50388</link>
<description>How to plan new school year in Websams?</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103645">WPSII-50388</key>
<summary>How to plan new school year in Websams?</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:42:50 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:48:43 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SCH</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:48:36 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> Guided user to plan new school year at School Management &gt; Planning New School Year &gt; Plan New School Year. Also informed user class levels will be copied from Current Year but student will not be promoted. She needs to promote student at Assessment &gt; Promotion &gt; By Class
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50387] Appeared an error message "E-51023 : File cannot be prepared. Selection Results and Class Schedules NOT yet imported." after the user clicked the Prepare button at Applied Learning > Data Communication > Prepare Outgoing Data > {Student Application (Mode
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50387</link>
<description>
Appeared an error message &quot;E-51023 : File cannot be prepared. Selection Results and Class Schedules NOT yet imported.&quot; after the user clicked the Prepare button at Applied Learning &gt; Data Communication &gt; Prepare Outgoing Data &gt; {Student Application (Mode 1 and Mode 2)}.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103644">WPSII-50387</key>
<summary>
Appeared an error message "E-51023 : File cannot be prepared. Selection Results and Class Schedules NOT yet imported." after the user clicked the Prepare button at Applied Learning > Data Communication > Prepare Outgoing Data > {Student Application (Mode
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:27:58 +0800 (CST)</created>

<component>APL</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:30:59 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> We suggested that the user needs to decrypt the CDS messages of the Applied Learning Courses of Class Schedule and the Selection Result at CDS &gt; Incoming Message. Then, he can import these data files at Applied Learning &gt; Data Communication &gt; Process Incoming Data. After that, he can prepare the Student Application (Mode 1 and Mode 2) again.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50385] Appeared an error message "E-42082 : Selected student is not absent on his(her) latest attendance day / The absent reason of the selected student does not account for suspected dropout." after the user clicked the Reg No. of the suspected dropout ...
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50385</link>
<description>
Appeared an error message &quot;E-42082 : Selected student is not absent on his(her) latest attendance day / The absent reason of the selected student does not account for suspected dropout.&quot; after the user clicked the Reg No. of the suspected dropout student at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [Add] &gt; [Search].
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103642">WPSII-50385</key>
<summary>
Appeared an error message "E-42082 : Selected student is not absent on his(her) latest attendance day / The absent reason of the selected student does not account for suspected dropout." after the user clicked the Reg No. of the suspected dropout ...
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:00:30 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:56:18 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:56:18 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We guided the user to take the attendance record with 7 or more continuous school days. Today attendance record must be included if she would like to generate the Attendance Form A today. The Suspected Dropout Indicator of absent reason must be &quot;Y&quot; at Code Management &gt; Maintenance &gt; Absent Reason. Then fill in the information of Form A at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout, click the &quot;Send Data to CDS&quot; button, prepare and confirm it. And then encrypt and send it out to EDB at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50384] The First Attendance Date of a student profile is changed from "01/09/2017" to today at "Student > Profile > Schooling" after the user had ever changed the Promotion Status of this student to "Graduated" and "Not Assigned" at Assessment > Promotion > ...
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50384</link>
<description>
The First Attendance Date of a student profile is changed from &quot;01/09/2017&quot; to today at &quot;Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling&quot; after the user had ever changed the Promotion Status of this student to &quot;Graduated&quot; and &quot;Not Assigned&quot; at Assessment &gt; Promotion &gt; By Each Student &gt; [Search]. How to solve it?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103641">WPSII-50384</key>
<summary>
The First Attendance Date of a student profile is changed from "01/09/2017" to today at "Student > Profile > Schooling" after the user had ever changed the Promotion Status of this student to "Graduated" and "Not Assigned" at Assessment > Promotion > ...
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 11:53:51 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:45:58 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:45:58 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to click the bottommost hyperlink of First Attended in this student profile at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling, adjust the First Day of Attendance to &quot;01/09/2018&quot;and save it.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50381] Appeared an error message "E-21142: Departed student selected for student mapping." after the user clicked the Confirm button at SLP > Institute Application > Student Mapping. However, a check-box of a departed student is dimmed. How to solve it?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50381</link>
<description>
Appeared an error message &quot;E-21142: Departed student selected for student mapping.&quot; after the user clicked the Confirm button at SLP &gt; Institute Application &gt; Student Mapping. However, a check-box of a departed student is dimmed. How to solve it?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103638">WPSII-50381</key>
<summary>
Appeared an error message "E-21142: Departed student selected for student mapping." after the user clicked the Confirm button at SLP > Institute Application > Student Mapping. However, a check-box of a departed student is dimmed. How to solve it?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="3">Medium</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 11:08:25 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:15:44 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SLP</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:15:03 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that two S6 departed students will not be submitted. We suggested him to unselect the check-boxes of &quot;JUPAS Applicants&quot; and &quot;Designated Students&quot; on the both departed students and click the Save button at SLP &gt; Institute Application &gt; Generate Student List for Institute Application &gt; [Search]. After that, they will be removed in the applicant list at SLP &gt; Institute Application &gt; Student Mapping. Then he can confirm it.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 12:15:44 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that the problem has been solved. He agreed to close this case.
</comment>
</comments>

Andrew: <br/> Informed user table name: tb_sec_user and field expired_date for inactive stuff should be null or before current date.

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50376] A student should not be absent on the Teacher Development Day. How to update this student's attendance record in WebSAMS now?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50376</link>
<description>
A student should not be absent on the Teacher Development Day. How to update this student's attendance record in WebSAMS now?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103633">WPSII-50376</key>
<summary>
A student should not be absent on the Teacher Development Day. How to update this student's attendance record in WebSAMS now?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 10:51:46 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 11:04:33 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 11:04:33 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user will not set this day to a holiday and all students do not need to go the school. We suggested her to take attendance status to &quot;N.A.&quot; at Attendance &gt; Maintenance &gt; By Student &gt; [Search] &gt; {Reg No.} &gt; [View].
</comment>
</comments>
<customfields>
<customfield id="customfield_10015" key="com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.customfieldtypes:textfield">

<customfieldvalues>
<customfieldvalue>Ms. Fu</customfieldvalue>
</customfieldvalues>
</customfield>

<customfieldvalues>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50372] Failed to enter the new password in the field of Re-Type New School Key at CDS > School Key Management > Change School Key.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50372</link>
<description>
Failed to enter the new password in the field of Re-Type New School Key at CDS &gt; School Key Management &gt; Change School Key.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103629">WPSII-50372</key>
<summary>
Failed to enter the new password in the field of Re-Type New School Key at CDS > School Key Management > Change School Key.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 10:25:01 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 13 Mar 2018 10:37:49 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>CDS</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 10:36:30 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to follow the school key format as below: - <br/> <br/> - contain English character(s) a-z (lower case) <br/> - contain English character(s) A-Z (upper case) <br/> - contain digit(s) 0-9 <br/> - contain special character(s) (&quot;Space&quot; is not allowed) <br/> <br/> The School Key should fulfill any 3 out of the 4 criteria above. <br/> Length of password: 8-20 characters <br/> At least 2 characters different from the Old one
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 13 Mar 2018 10:37:49 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that there is no problem now. She agreed to close this case.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50366] Why the School Year is "2016" at "Student Activities > Maintenance by Activity" instead of the current school year "2017"?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50366</link>
<description>
Why the School Year is &quot;2016&quot; at &quot;Student Activities &gt; Maintenance by Activity&quot; instead of the current school year &quot;2017&quot;?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103622">WPSII-50366</key>
<summary>
Why the School Year is "2016" at "Student Activities > Maintenance by Activity" instead of the current school year "2017"?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Mon, 12 Mar 2018 16:12:30 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 12 Mar 2018 16:18:34 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STA</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 12 Mar 2018 16:18:34 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We guided the user to change the School Year under the Default Value from &quot;2016&quot; to &quot;2017&quot; and saved it at Student Activities &gt; Activity Setup &gt; STA Parameter. After that, the problem has been solved. He agreed to close this case.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50364] A user would like to calculate average scores of 3 Assessments which are the last school year average scores of T3A1 (P5/2), current school year average scores of T1A1 (P6/1) and T2A1 (P6/2) on the same P6 students. How to extract their average scores ...
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50364</link>
<description>
A user would like to calculate average scores of 3 Assessments which are the last school year average scores of T3A1 (P5/2), current school year average scores of T1A1 (P6/1) and T2A1 (P6/2) on the same P6 students. How to extract their average scores by Excel format?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103620">WPSII-50364</key>
<summary>
A user would like to calculate average scores of 3 Assessments which are the last school year average scores of T3A1 (P5/2), current school year average scores of T1A1 (P6/1) and T2A1 (P6/2) on the same P6 students. How to extract their average scores ...
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Mon, 12 Mar 2018 14:26:30 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 14 Mar 2018 19:48:07 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Mon, 12 Mar 2018 14:33:36 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> Unable to contact user, Leave a message.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 14 Mar 2018 19:14:34 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user would not like to change any Assesssment and Term setting in the school's WebSAMS. We replied to him that WebSAMS has not this kind of function to fulfill this condition. However, we suggested that he can export all the average scores of these 3 Assessments at Assessment &gt; Consolidation &gt; Export. Then he can group these average scores and calcuate to averages in Excel.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 14 Mar 2018 19:47:48 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The average scores in the field names of the export file are &quot;T3A1_Score&quot; (P5/2), &quot;T1A1_Score&quot; (P6/1) and &quot;T2A1_Score&quot; (P6/2). <br/>
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50361] What is the encryption password in the pop-up page after the user clicked the Download button at Student > Info Upload > Student Info?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50361</link>
<description>
What is the encryption password in the pop-up page after the user clicked the Download button at Student &gt; Info Upload &gt; Student Info?
</description>
<environment>Browser: IE</environment>
<key id="103617">WPSII-50361</key>
<summary>
What is the encryption password in the pop-up page after the user clicked the Download button at Student > Info Upload > Student Info?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Mon, 12 Mar 2018 14:07:22 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 12 Mar 2018 14:17:40 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 12 Mar 2018 14:11:02 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied to the user that the encryption password is user-defined. He can follow the password format as below: - <br/> <br/> Password Format: <br/> - contain English character(s) a-z (lower case) <br/> - contain English character(s) A-Z (upper case) <br/> - contain digit(s) 0-9 <br/> - contain special character(s) (&quot;Space&quot; is not allowed) <br/> The password should fulfill any 3 out of the 4 criteria above. <br/> <br/> Length of password: 8-40 characters
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 12 Mar 2018 14:15:34 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that he cannot find the above password format rule in the pop-up page.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 12 Mar 2018 14:17:40 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to remove the WebSAMS URL in the &quot;Compatibility View Settings&quot; at IE menu at &quot;Tools&quot;.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50358] How to submit Attendance Form B if the user has saved the Return Date at Attendance > Suspected Dropout > Return of Suspected Dropout?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50358</link>
<description>
How to submit Attendance Form B if the user has saved the Return Date at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Return of Suspected Dropout?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103614">WPSII-50358</key>
<summary>
How to submit Attendance Form B if the user has saved the Return Date at Attendance > Suspected Dropout > Return of Suspected Dropout?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Mon, 12 Mar 2018 11:13:33 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 12 Mar 2018 11:45:45 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 12 Mar 2018 11:37:11 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to select the two returned students at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Return of Suspected Dropout, click the &quot;Send Data to CDS&quot; button, prepare and confirm it in the pop-up page. Then encrypt and send it out to EDB at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 12 Mar 2018 11:45:36 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that she failed to prepare the Attendance Form B. <br/> <br/> She found &quot;Confirmed&quot; in the file status of Form B at Student &gt; Data Communication &gt; Prepare Outgoing Data. We suggested her to request her colleague to send out a Student Form B at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message. After that she can prepare Attendance Form B again.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50350] How to fill in the fields of "IP Address for connecting NAS" and "Name of Windows Firewall Rule for WebSAMS" at Security > Security Check?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50350</link>
<description>
How to fill in the fields of &quot;IP Address for connecting NAS&quot; and &quot;Name of Windows Firewall Rule for WebSAMS&quot; at Security &gt; Security Check?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103605">WPSII-50350</key>
<summary>
How to fill in the fields of "IP Address for connecting NAS" and "Name of Windows Firewall Rule for WebSAMS" at Security > Security Check?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Fri, 9 Mar 2018 15:42:54 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Fri, 9 Mar 2018 19:43:06 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SEC</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 19:43:06 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to enter the IP address of WebSAMS Server for the connecting NAS to the field of &quot;IP Address for connecting NAS&quot;. Then find the Inbound rule name of WebSAMS in Windows Firewall on WebSAMS Server, enter this name to the field of &quot;Name of Windows Firewall Rule for WebSAMS&quot; and save it at Security &gt; Security Check.
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50349] How to connect the server Database from websams client to websams server by ODBC for Crystal report extract data?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50349</link>
<description>
How to connect the server Database from websams client to websams server by ODBC for Crystal report extract data?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103604">WPSII-50349</key>
<summary>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50348] Appeared an error message "The following IPs are not in WebSAMS segment:..." and "Inbound rule is not defined in WebSAMS server." in the Details sheet of the Security Exception report. How to handle it?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50348</link>
<description>
Appeared an error message &quot;The following IPs are not in WebSAMS segment:...&quot; and &quot;Inbound rule is not defined in WebSAMS server.&quot; in the Details sheet of the Security Exception report. How to handle it?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103603">WPSII-50348</key>
<summary>
Appeared an error message "The following IPs are not in WebSAMS segment:..." and "Inbound rule is not defined in WebSAMS server." in the Details sheet of the Security Exception report. How to handle it?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Fri, 9 Mar 2018 15:26:57 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Fri, 9 Mar 2018 19:29:33 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SEC</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 19:29:32 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to enter the IP address of WebSAMS Server for the connecting NAS to the field of &quot;IP Address for connecting NAS&quot;, enter the Name of &quot;Windows Firewall Rule for WebSAMS&quot; and save it at Security &gt; Security Check.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50343] A staff failed to run a query and WebSAMS appeared an error message "E-16066 : You are not allowed to execute this query." How to solve it?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50343</link>
<description>
A staff failed to run a query and WebSAMS appeared an error message &quot;E-16066 : You are not allowed to execute this query.&quot; How to solve it?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103595">WPSII-50343</key>
<summary>
A staff failed to run a query and WebSAMS appeared an error message "E-16066 : You are not allowed to execute this query." How to solve it?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="3">Medium</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Fri, 9 Mar 2018 10:41:27 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Fri, 9 Mar 2018 11:13:07 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>DAT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 11:13:07 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied to the user that the query owner can share her query at Data Management &gt; Query Sharing. Or she can copy the SQL Statement from the owner's query and paste to a new query at &quot;Data Management &gt; Query Maintenance &gt; [Search] &gt; {Query Name}&quot;. Then share to this staff.
</comment>
</comments>

Vincent: <br/> STU Form A already sent to EDB. <br/> User need the re-admin that the student again and depart the student again.

Vincent: <br/> We suggest user to consult SCHOOL PLACES ALLOCATION.

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50338] Unable to find non-JUPAS students on the prepared file of Academic Performance File at [S-SLP42-01] SLP > Institute Application > School Reference Report > Prepare Data File
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50338</link>
<description>
Unable to find non-JUPAS students on the prepared file of Academic Performance File at [S-SLP42-01] SLP &gt; Institute Application &gt; School Reference Report &gt; Prepare Data File
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103590">WPSII-50338</key>
<summary>
Unable to find non-JUPAS students on the prepared file of Academic Performance File at [S-SLP42-01] SLP > Institute Application > School Reference Report > Prepare Data File
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 16:43:43 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 16:56:11 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SLP</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 16:56:05 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> We suggest user to tick the tickbox of &quot;Designated Students&quot; for EAPP student at &quot;[S-SLP50-01] SLP &gt; Institute Application &gt; Generate Student List for Institute Application &gt; [Search]&quot; and tick all the student at &quot;[S-SLP31-01] SLP &gt; Institute Application &gt; Student Mapping &quot; before Prepare Data File.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>[WPSII-50334] How to depart a student in WebSAMS?</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50334</link>
<description>How to depart a student in WebSAMS?</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103586">WPSII-50334</key>
<summary>How to depart a student in WebSAMS?</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 15:23:28 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 15:28:14 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 15:24:40 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vicnent: <br/> We suggested the user to select the Status to &quot;Departed&quot; in the departed student profile at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling. Then fill in all the information, prepare and confirm Form A at Student &gt; Data Communication &gt; Prepare Outgoing Data. And then encrypt and send it out at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50333] 1. Can user install Crystal Reports at home? 2. How many user can its licence support? 3. What do they concern if they can install it at home?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50333</link>
<description>
1. Can user install Crystal Reports at home? <br/> 2. How many user can its licence support? <br/> 3. What do they concern if they can install it at home?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103585">WPSII-50333</key>
<summary>
1. Can user install Crystal Reports at home? 2. How many user can its licence support? 3. What do they concern if they can install it at home?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 15:21:18 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 19:36:51 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>System</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 19:36:51 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> 1. The user can install Crystal Reports at home if the school purchased license can support the total no. of user; <br/> 2. Crystal Reports was purchased by the school. He can check with the school's software vendor how many support client in her purchased licence. <br/> 3. However, Crystal Reports can connect to WebSAMS database in WebSAMS LAN segment only. Thus any user out of WebSAMS LAN segment who can just modify the report layout. And any function that does not need to connect the school's WebSAMS database.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50332] How to know the difference of the no. of student in subject grade "A" if user would like to change the grade "A" of minimum value inclusive from ">=86" to ">=85"?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50332</link>
<description>
How to know the difference of the no. of student in subject grade &quot;A&quot; if user would like to change the grade &quot;A&quot; of minimum value inclusive from &quot;&gt;=86&quot; to &quot;&gt;=85&quot;?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103584">WPSII-50332</key>
<summary>
How to know the difference of the no. of student in subject grade "A" if user would like to change the grade "A" of minimum value inclusive from ">=86" to ">=85"?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 15:09:15 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 18:49:22 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 18:49:22 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to follow the steps as below: - <br/> 1. To select the specific subject(s) and generate the report Score / Grade Distribution Analysis (By Subject)(R-ASR083-C/E) for the current data; <br/> 2. To check the current grade table name to the specific subject(s) at Assessment &gt; Setup &gt; Subject &gt; [Search] &gt; {ATA}; <br/> 3. Reset Assessment Profile at Assessment &gt; Setup &gt; Confirm; <br/> 4. Change the &quot;Min Val Inclusive&quot; of grade &quot;A&quot; from &quot;&gt;=86&quot; to &quot;&gt;=85&quot; and save it at &quot;Assessment &gt; Setup &gt; Code Table &gt; {Grade Conversion Table Name in step 2}&quot; or create a new grade conversion table for &quot;&gt;=85&quot;; <br/> 5. Change the current grade table name to the new grade table to the specific subject(s) at &quot;Assessment &gt; Setup &gt; Subject &gt; [Search] &gt; {ATA}&quot; if he will use a new grade table. Otherwise, continue to the next step; <br/> 6. Confirm Assessment Profile at Assessment &gt; Setup &gt; Confirm; <br/> 7. Run consolidation to the specific class level and ATA at Assessment &gt; Consolidation &gt; Consolidation; <br/> 8. To select the specific subject(s) and generate the report Score / Grade Distribution Analysis (By Subject)(R-ASR083-C/E) for the new data; <br/> 9. Finally, compare two report data in the steps 1 and 8.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50330] How to display subject remarks of T2 in the school defined report card P?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50330</link>
<description>
How to display subject remarks of T2 in the school defined report card P?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103582">WPSII-50330</key>
<summary>
How to display subject remarks of T2 in the school defined report card P?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 15:05:29 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 18:22:35 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 18:22:35 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied to the user that WebSAMS has no function to select the specific subject remarks of T2 for report card P. It will extract to all subject remarks at Assessment &gt; Report P Data &gt; Extract. Then modify the report template of report card P to display the specific data by Crystal Reports. <br/> <br/> However, he does not know how to do it. We suggested him to consult the SLO.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50325] A user's administrative account and the WebSAMS built-in accounts "sysadmin" failed to log on WebSAMS and appeared an error message "E-12077 : User Account locked, please contact your System Administrator." How to unlock it?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50325</link>
<description>
A user's administrative account and the WebSAMS built-in accounts &quot;sysadmin&quot; failed to log on WebSAMS and appeared an error message &quot;E-12077 : User Account locked, please contact your System Administrator.&quot; How to unlock it?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103577">WPSII-50325</key>
<summary>
A user's administrative account and the WebSAMS built-in accounts "sysadmin" failed to log on WebSAMS and appeared an error message "E-12077 : User Account locked, please contact your System Administrator." How to unlock it?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 10:58:15 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 11:02:24 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SEC</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 11:02:07 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> He can access WebSAMS with &quot;localhost&quot; or &quot;<a href="http://127.0.0.1">http://127.0.0.1</a>&quot; on WebSAMS Server by the built-in account &quot;sysadmin&quot;. It will not lock it. Then he can unlock the both accounts at Security &gt; Access Control &gt; Unlock Account
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50323] How to do suspected dropout in Websams
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50323</link>
<description>How to do suspected dropout in Websams</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103574">WPSII-50323</key>
<summary>How to do suspected dropout in Websams</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 10:30:59 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 10:35:22 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 10:35:13 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> We guided the user to take the attendance record with 7 or more continuous school days. Today attendance record must be included if he would like to generate the Attendance Form A today. The Suspected Dropout Indicator of absent reason must be &quot;Y&quot; at Code Management &gt; Maintenance &gt; Absent Reason. Then, fill in the information of Form A at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout, click on the &quot;Send Data to CDS&quot; button and confirm it. And then, encrypt it and send it out to EDB at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
</comments>

</description>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50319] User claimed all STA record of Duration 1 was changed to Duration 2, How change it back to Duration 1?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50319</link>
<description>
User claimed all STA record of Duration 1 was changed to Duration 2, How change it back to Duration 1?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103570">WPSII-50319</key>
<summary>
User claimed all STA record of Duration 1 was changed to Duration 2, How change it back to Duration 1?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 09:50:00 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 10:30:32 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STA</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 10:30:14 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> We suggest user to export all the STA record of Duration 2 at Student Activities &gt; Export . <br/> Then, he can download the excel template at &quot;Student Activities &gt; Import &quot; and copy all the exported date to that file(Change the Duration to 1 ). <br/> After that, user can import the excel file at the same page.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>[WPSII-50317] How delete all the ANP record of T2?</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50317</link>
<description>How delete all the ANP record of T2?</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103568">WPSII-50317</key>
<summary>How delete all the ANP record of T2?</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 09:23:24 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 09:39:55 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ANP</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 09:39:23 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> We suggest user to backup all the ANP record of T2 by export function first. <br/> Also, we guided user to select the students by Class level at &quot;Award &amp; Punishment &gt; Maintenance &gt; By Batch&quot; . then, he can select all the student by tickbox and press [Edit Award] / [Edit Punishment] button, after that, we suggest user to input T2 period on the search function, select all students and press delete button to delete all the student ANP record.
</comment>
</comments>
<customfields>
<customfield id="customfield_10015" key="com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.customfieldtypes:textfield">

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50316] How to do suspected dropout in Websams
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50316</link>
<description>How to do suspected dropout in Websams</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103567">WPSII-50316</key>
<summary>How to do suspected dropout in Websams</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 09:17:23 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 8 Mar 2018 09:20:08 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 09:19:54 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> We guided the user to take the attendance record with 7 or more continuous school days. Today attendance record must be included if he would like to generate the Attendance Form A today. The Suspected Dropout Indicator of absent reason must be &quot;Y&quot; at Code Management &gt; Maintenance &gt; Absent Reason. Then, fill in the information of Form A at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout, click on the &quot;Send Data to CDS&quot; button and confirm it. And then, encrypt it and send it out to EDB at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50314] What does user need to do in WebSAMS if a school will has a periodic inspection of power supply? All WebSAMS devices will switch off.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50314</link>
<description>
What does user need to do in WebSAMS if a school will has a periodic inspection of power supply? All WebSAMS devices will switch off.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103564">WPSII-50314</key>
<summary>
What does user need to do in WebSAMS if a school will has a periodic inspection of power supply? All WebSAMS devices will switch off.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 17:55:57 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 18:58:22 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>System</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 18:58:22 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to follow the switch-off flow about WebSAMS as below: - <br/> 1.	Make sure no user to access WebSAMS; <br/> 2.	Stop all WebSAMS services on WebSAMS Server in order by JBoss, database and Apache; <br/> 3.	Shut down WebSAMS Server; <br/> 4.	Switch off NAS device connecting to WebSAMS Server; <br/> 5.	Shut down WebSAMS HTTP Server <br/> 6.	Switch off other network devices in WebSAMS LAN segment, such as WebSAMS workstation, WebSAMS router or network switch. <br/> 7. Reverse the above sequence to switch them on when the power supply has resumed normally. <br/>
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50312] Why the non-attendance records cannot be updated at Assessment > Enquiry > Student Result > [Search] > {Student Name}?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50312</link>
<description>
Why the non-attendance records cannot be updated at Assessment &gt; Enquiry &gt; Student Result &gt; [Search] &gt; {Student Name}?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103562">WPSII-50312</key>

</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 16:03:40 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 19:51:08 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 19:51:08 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested that the user can select the specific ATA, the radio button of Non-Attendance Record, other information and search it. Then click the &quot;Copy From Student Attendance Module&quot; button.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50311] What is the difference in between the Alternatives I / Alternatives II / Both Alternatives I & II at FMP > Bookkeeping > Pre-Year End?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50311</link>
<description>
What is the difference in between the Alternatives I / Alternatives II / Both Alternatives I &amp; II at FMP &gt; Bookkeeping &gt; Pre-Year End?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103561">WPSII-50311</key>
<summary>
What is the difference in between the Alternatives I / Alternatives II / Both Alternatives I & II at FMP > Bookkeeping > Pre-Year End?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 15:55:43 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 17:38:46 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>FMP</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 17:36:48 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> As the school end-users have 2 different alternatives to book-in the usage of Non-school Specific Grant, system has to provide 2 different report templates of FBK-49 for the schools to download. <br/> <br/> Alternative I is for those schools without transfer of money from EOEBG account to individual old General/Special Domain Account Code. <br/> Alternative II is for those schools with transfer of money from EOEBG account to individual old General/Special Domain Account Code. <br/> <br/> Depends on the &quot;Alternative&quot; field, <br/> If the value is &quot;Alternative I&quot;, report R-FBK049 will be generated. <br/> If the value is &quot;Alternative II&quot;, report R-FBK055 will be generated. <br/> If the value is &quot;Both Alternative I &amp; II&quot;, both R-FBK049 and R-FBK055 will be generated. <br/> If the value is &quot;Blank&quot;, R-FBK049 and R-FBK055 will not be generated. <br/> <br/> Related Report: <br/> R-FBK049 EOEBG - Financial Statement (Alternative I) <br/> R-FBK055 EOEBG - Financial Statement (Alternative II) <br/>
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50309] A user would like to adjust some subject scores in a class. However, the total no. of students in OMC reduced after she executed consolidation again. Two departed students are not counted into the OMC. How to solve it?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50309</link>
<description>
A user would like to adjust some subject scores in a class. However, the total no. of students in OMC reduced after she executed consolidation again. Two departed students are not counted into the OMC. How to solve it?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103558">WPSII-50309</key>
<summary>
A user would like to adjust some subject scores in a class. However, the total no. of students in OMC reduced after she executed consolidation again. Two departed students are not counted into the OMC. How to solve it?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 15:15:34 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 19:44:33 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 19:44:33 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested that the user can search two departed student profiles at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Search Student. Then she can click on the Schooling tab, click the bottommost hyperlink of First Attended, select the check-box of &quot;Printing in report&quot; and save them. After that she can execute consolidation again.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50300] One of class levels has 115 students. One of students has absent (Not Considered) to all subjects from T1A1 to T1A3. Why the total no. of student in OMF of each subject at "Assessment > Enquiry > Student Result > [Search] > {Student Name}" is 114, but ...
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50300</link>
<description>
One of class levels has 115 students. One of students has absent (Not Considered) to all subjects from T1A1 to T1A3. Why the total no. of student in OMF of each subject at &quot;Assessment &gt; Enquiry &gt; Student Result &gt; [Search] &gt; {Student Name}&quot; is 114, but the total no. of Student OM in Class Level is 115?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103549">WPSII-50300</key>
<summary>
One of class levels has 115 students. One of students has absent (Not Considered) to all subjects from T1A1 to T1A3. Why the total no. of student in OMF of each subject at "Assessment > Enquiry > Student Result > [Search] > {Student Name}" is 114, but ...
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 11:30:42 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 19:14:45 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 19:14:45 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that there is no problem after he changed all subject scores of this student to absent (Zero Mark). We reminded him all his subject scores will be counted to zero mark. He knows it and agrees to close this case.
</comment>
</comments>

</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50295</link>
<description>
No record found after a user admitted two students in the middle of the current school year and prepared Form B or Form C at Student &gt; Data Communication &gt; Prepare Outgoing Data.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103544">WPSII-50295</key>
<summary>
No record found after a user admitted two students in the middle of the current school year and prepared Form B or Form C at Student > Data Communication > Prepare Outgoing Data.
</summary>

<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>

<updated>Fri, 9 Mar 2018 12:20:29 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 16:22:26 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> Affected Student Info: - <br/> Ref No.: 17134 <br/> Class Level: 5D (??) <br/> Class No.: 23 <br/> <br/> Ref No.: 17136 <br/> Class Level: 3A (??) <br/> Class No.: 24 <br/> <br/> The both students have not STRN.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 16:29:21 +0800 (CST)" level="">Louie: <br/> Assign to Jacky Lai.</comment>
<comment author="jackylai" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 11:36:33 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Ref No.: 17134 <br/> &nbsp;Class Level: 5D (??) <br/> Class No.: 23 <br/> FRMCStatus: S (Form C Sent) <br/> <br/> &nbsp;Ref No.: 17136 <br/> &nbsp;Class Level: 3A (??) <br/> Class No.: 24 <br/> FRMCSTATUS: S (Form C Sent) <br/> FRMDSTATUS: W (Update STRN, Pending for Form D Preparation) <br/>
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 11:40:18 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> In according to the Form C status of the both students in the database record, they had been submitted. The user can check the CDS messages of Form C at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 11:41:21 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> Unable to contact the user. To leave a message.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 12:19:37 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user confirmed that the Form C of the both students had been submitted before. And the school has received the STRN data file for one of them. We suggested her to consult the EDB Officer of SPA Section if she still cannot receive the rest.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 12:20:29 +0800 (CST)" level="">Louie: <br/> She agreed to close this case.</comment>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50294] 1. Why the result of "Reconciliation Month To Prepare" is "02/2018" at "FMP > Bookkeeping > Bank Reconciliation > [Searh]" if user entered it to "01/2018" in the above text box and searched it? 2. And why all the check-boxes are dimmed at the same web ...
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50294</link>
<description>
1. Why the result of &quot;Reconciliation Month To Prepare&quot; is &quot;02/2018&quot; at &quot;FMP &gt; Bookkeeping &gt; Bank Reconciliation &gt; [Searh]&quot; if user entered it to &quot;01/2018&quot; in the above text box and searched it? 2. And why all the check-boxes are dimmed at the same web page?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103543">WPSII-50294</key>
<summary>
1. Why the result of "Reconciliation Month To Prepare" is "02/2018" at "FMP > Bookkeeping > Bank Reconciliation > [Searh]" if user entered it to "01/2018" in the above text box and searched it? 2. And why all the check-boxes are dimmed at the same web ...
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 10:52:24 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 15:44:13 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>FMP</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 15:44:13 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> 1. The above searching Reconciliation Month and the bottom result Reconciliation Month can be different. It is normal. <br/> 2. Under any matched reconciliation record, its check-box will be active only when the above searching Reconciliation Month is same as the bottom result Reconciliation Month. <br/> <br/> Thus the user can enter the bottom result Reconciliation Month to the upper Reconciliation Month &quot;02/2018&quot; and search it. Then the check-boxes will be active. If she would like to change the bottom reconciliaiton month, she can select any specific reconciliation record(s), click the Unmatch button, change the reconciliation month to &quot;01/2018&quot; and search it again. The bottom reconciliation month of all unmatch records will change to the searching month (01/2018). Then she can select the specific record(s) and click the Match button.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50292] 1. Which does user set the backup type in WebSAMS daily backup to full backup or incremental backup? 2. Is the school's WebSAMS normal if full size of daily backup is more than 100GB?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50292</link>
<description>
1. Which does user set the backup type in WebSAMS daily backup to full backup or incremental backup? <br/> 2. Is the school's WebSAMS normal if full size of daily backup is more than 100GB?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103541">WPSII-50292</key>
<summary>
1. Which does user set the backup type in WebSAMS daily backup to full backup or incremental backup? 2. Is the school's WebSAMS normal if full size of daily backup is more than 100GB?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 10:43:32 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 12 Mar 2018 09:56:29 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>System</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 11:55:53 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> 1. We suggested the user to use full backup in WebSAMS daily backup. <br/> 2. It is in according to the school's data size in WebSAMS. We suggerted him to clean up the cache of Java Web Start, Crystal Server logs and WebSAMS Major Upgrade files on WebSAMS Server at &quot;E:\Temp\wsup1\yyyyMMdd.HHmm&quot;.
</comment>
<comment author="agent15" created="Mon, 12 Mar 2018 09:56:29 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> Reply user the path of WebSAMS Major Upgrade files on WebSAMS Server at &quot;E:\Temp\wsup1\yyyyMMdd.HHmm&quot; as user enquiry.
</comment>
</comments>

<customfieldvalues>
<customfieldvalue>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 10:43:00 +0800 (CST)</customfieldvalue>
</customfieldvalues>
</customfield>
<customfield id="customfield_10142" key="com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.customfieldtypes:datetime">

<customfieldvalues>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50284] The final term end date of S6 is on 28-Feb-2018 at School Management > Calendar > Setup > Term Information > {Secondary 6}, but attendance still can be taking after the end date. Is there any problem?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50284</link>
<description>
The final term end date of S6 is on 28-Feb-2018 at School Management &gt; Calendar &gt; Setup &gt; Term Information &gt; {Secondary 6}, but attendance still can be taking after the end date. Is there any problem?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103532">WPSII-50284</key>
<summary>
The final term end date of S6 is on 28-Feb-2018 at School Management > Calendar > Setup > Term Information > {Secondary 6}, but attendance still can be taking after the end date. Is there any problem?
</summary>
<type id="1">Problem</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="jackylai">Jacky Lai</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Tue, 6 Mar 2018 16:15:05 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Fri, 9 Mar 2018 14:03:08 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Tue, 6 Mar 2018 16:20:31 +0800 (CST)" level="">Andrew: <br/> Case assigned to Jacky</comment>
<comment author="jackylai" created="Thu, 8 Mar 2018 15:42:41 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Please help to clarify which function or provide captured screen for detail analyst.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 12:30:11 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The Attendance taking end day is to follow the School Year End Date at &quot;School Management &gt; School Calendar &gt; Setup &gt; Basic Setup&quot; instead of the final term end date.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 12:30:28 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> Unable to contact the user. To leave a message.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 9 Mar 2018 12:45:01 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied the above comment to the user. However, he would like to know how to enter the attendance records in these period faster. He would not like to do it by day. <br/> <br/> We suggested him to download the template at Attendance &gt; Import Data &gt; Import. Then save it as a CSV file and import it at the same web page.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>[WPSII-50283] How to depart a student in WebSAMS?</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50283</link>
<description>How to depart a student in WebSAMS?</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103531">WPSII-50283</key>
<summary>How to depart a student in WebSAMS?</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 6 Mar 2018 15:49:14 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 6 Mar 2018 17:41:41 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 6 Mar 2018 17:41:41 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to select the Status to &quot;Departed&quot; in the departed student profile at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling. Then fill in all the information, prepare and confirm Form A at Student &gt; Data Communication &gt; Prepare Outgoing Data. And then encrypt and send it out at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50280] The HTTP Server is crashed after the school had power outage. How to solve it?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50280</link>
<description>
The HTTP Server is crashed after the school had power outage. How to solve it?
</description>

<component>System</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 6 Mar 2018 16:23:28 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested that the user can run the &quot;grepconfig&quot; command on HTTP Server to do the backup of its configuration and two eCertificate files because the Linux SuSE is still runing. It has some hardware failure only. If the hardware cannot be fixed, he can download the Doc 33 - Installation Guidelines for WebSAMS 3.0 at &quot;<a href="http://cdr.websams.edb.gov.hk">http://cdr.websams.edb.gov.hk</a> &gt; ?? &gt; ???? &gt; ??????? &gt; ???? [ ?????? ] ????????&quot;, request the installer of HTTP Server and follow the guildeline to reinstall on a new HTTP Server.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50278] Unable to prepare Form A at Attendance > Suspected Dropout > Maintain Suspected Dropout > [View].
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50278</link>
<description>
Unable to prepare Form A at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [View].
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103525">WPSII-50278</key>
<summary>
Unable to prepare Form A at Attendance > Suspected Dropout > Maintain Suspected Dropout > [View].
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 6 Mar 2018 12:40:14 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 6 Mar 2018 13:51:07 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 6 Mar 2018 13:51:07 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We guided the user to click the hyperlink of &quot;N&quot; in the field of &quot;Form A Completed&quot; at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [View]. Then select any reason in the field of &quot;Reason for Leaving/Absent from School&quot;, fill in other information and clicked the Comfirm button, select the suspected dropout student, click on the &quot;Send Data to CDS&quot; button, prepare and confirm it. And then encrypt it and send it out to EDB at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50277] How to set user right to a cleck's WebSAMS login account?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50277</link>
<description>
How to set user right to a cleck's WebSAMS login account?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103524">WPSII-50277</key>
<summary>
How to set user right to a cleck's WebSAMS login account?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 6 Mar 2018 12:14:52 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 6 Mar 2018 13:44:53 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SEC</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 6 Mar 2018 13:44:53 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to set the user right of the user group of CLERK at Security &gt; Access Control &gt; User Group. Then he can add the clerk's login account at &quot;Security &gt; Access Control &gt; User Group &gt; {CLERK} &gt; Add Account to Group&quot; or attach the specific user group(s) in his/her account at Security &gt; Access Control &gt; User Account &gt; Search User Account.
</comment>
</comments>

<description>
How to modify STRN at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Particulars?
</description>
<environment/>

</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>

<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>

<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Tue, 6 Mar 2018 09:31:46 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> We suggested that the user can change the HKIC No. to a valid dummy HKID &quot;A000000(3)&quot;and save it. Then, the text box of STRN will be opened. And then, correct the dummy HKID, adjust the STRN and save it.
</comment>
</comments>
