<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50267] How to solve the problem when user prepared Student Form A at "Student > Data Communication > Prepare Outgoing Data > [Prepare]" and he can find an error report?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50267</link>
<description>
How to solve the problem when user prepared Student Form A at &quot;Student &gt; Data Communication &gt; Prepare Outgoing Data &gt; [Prepare]&quot; and he can find an error report?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103513">WPSII-50267</key>
<summary>
How to solve the problem when user prepared Student Form A at "Student > Data Communication > Prepare Outgoing Data > [Prepare]" and he can find an error report?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 16:19:07 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 17:23:07 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 5 Mar 2018 17:23:07 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested that the user can fill in or correct any wrong student data to his/her student profile in according to any field(s) with a cross mark ( X ) in this error report Blank / Invalid Items on Form A (R-STU56). After that he can prepare the Form A again.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50266] Unable to do WebSAMS 3.0 Major Upgrade after he reinstalled the Java 7 Update 25 (64-bit) on WebSAMS Server.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50266</link>
<description>
Unable to do WebSAMS 3.0 Major Upgrade after he reinstalled the Java 7 Update 25 (64-bit) on WebSAMS Server.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103512">WPSII-50266</key>
<summary>
Unable to do WebSAMS 3.0 Major Upgrade after he reinstalled the Java 7 Update 25 (64-bit) on WebSAMS Server.
</summary>
<type id="1">Problem</type>
<priority id="3">Medium</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 16:11:20 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 16:22:36 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>Version Upgrade</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 5 Mar 2018 16:18:09 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user had not followed up our procedure how to reinstall the Java 7 Update 25 (64-bit) (<a href="http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50259" title="A user has upgraded the Java version on WebSAMS Server. Is there any impact?"><strike>WPSII-50259</strike></a>). We guided him to change the Security Level from &quot;High&quot; to &quot;Medium&quot; on WebSAMS 3.0 Server at &quot;Control Panel &gt; Java &gt; Security tab&quot; and clicked OK button. Then selected Java Web Start to execute the JNLP file when he upgraded again. After that he claimed the problem has been solved. He agreed to close this case.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50265] How to reset password of 60 teachers' WebSAMS login account to one specific password by batch?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50265</link>
<description>
How to reset password of 60 teachers' WebSAMS login account to one specific password by batch?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103511">WPSII-50265</key>
<summary>
How to reset password of 60 teachers' WebSAMS login account to one specific password by batch?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 15:48:20 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 17:11:04 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SEC</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 5 Mar 2018 17:11:04 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied to the user that WebSAMS has not this kind of function. However, he can only reset their passwords by batch to individual when he selects their accounts at &quot;Security &gt; Access Control &gt; User Account &gt; Search User Account &gt; [Search]&quot; and clicks the &quot;Reset Password&quot; button. Then he can find all their passwords in the report Reset Password Report (R-SEC012-C/E).
</comment>
</comments>

<created>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 14:07:23 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 16:09:51 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>System</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Mon, 5 Mar 2018 14:36:11 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> Java version on WebSAMS 3.0 Server is unable to upgrade. Otherwise, JBoss cannot be started up. The user can click the Later button to ignore it when you will do WebSAMS 3.0 Major Upgrade. We sent the following procedure to him how to reinstall the Java 7 Update 25 (64-bit) on WebSAMS 3.0 Server: - <br/> <br/> 1. We sent the installer of Java 7 Update 25 (64-bit) to the user; <br/> 2. Make sure no user to access WebSAMS; <br/> 3. Stop WebSAMS services (Press CTRL+C to stop the JBoss Console &gt; Right-click the Sybase icon (next to the system clock) and select &quot;Shut down &quot;websams_0425&quot;&quot; &gt; Press CTRL+C to stop the Apache); <br/> 4. Right-click the Java 8 Update XXXX or newer version and select &quot;Uninstall&quot; at &quot;Control Panel &gt; Programs and Features&quot;; <br/> 5. Right-click the Java 7 Update 25 (64-bit) and select &quot;Uninstall&quot;; <br/> 6. Double-click the batch file &quot;installJava.bat&quot; to install Java 7 Update 25 (64-bit). DON'T execute the file &quot;jre-7u25-windows-x64.exe&quot;; <br/> 7. The window of Command Prompt will be closed automatically after the process completed; <br/> 8. Make sure the Security Level to be &quot;Medium&quot; on WebSAMS 3.0 Server at &quot;Control Panel &gt; Java &gt; Security tab&quot; and clicked OK button; <br/> 9. After install it successfully, start WebSAMS services to test it. <br/>
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 5 Mar 2018 15:38:30 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that the problem still cannot be solved even though he has reinstalled the Java 7 Update 25 (64-bit). <br/> <br/> We replied to him that he had not followed up the step 6 in our provided procedure by Email. We suggested him to uninstall it and execute the the batch file &quot;installJava.bat&quot; to install it again instead of the file &quot;jre-7u25-windows-x64.exe&quot;.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 5 Mar 2018 16:09:51 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that he can access WebSAMS now and agreed to close this case.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50248] How to change the subnet mask in WebSAMS HTTP Server?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50248</link>
<description>
How to change the subnet mask in WebSAMS HTTP Server?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103494">WPSII-50248</key>
<summary>
How to change the subnet mask in WebSAMS HTTP Server?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 08:34:12 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 10:09:01 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>System</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Mon, 5 Mar 2018 08:38:15 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> &nbsp;We suggested that the user can run the script &quot;reinstall&quot;. Then, press &quot;3&quot; to enter the new subnet mask and press &quot;0&quot; to confirm all the configuration. Then, reboot the HTTP Server. <br/>
</comment>
<comment author="agent15" created="Mon, 5 Mar 2018 09:36:20 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> [Revised] will suggested user that the user can run the script &quot;reinstall&quot;. Then, press &quot;3&quot; to enter the new subnet mask and press &quot;0&quot; to confirm all the configuration. Then, reboot the HTTP Server. But user cannot be reached, left message and waiting for reply
</comment>
<comment author="agent15" created="Mon, 5 Mar 2018 10:08:52 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> We also suggested the user to update the NAT in the school's firewall, IP address of ITED leg of WebSAMS router in the configuration of HTTP Server and WebSAMS router, update the new ITED subnet in the configuration file on WebSAMS Server at &quot;D:\WebSAMS3.0\JBoss-as-7.1.1.Final\standalone\configuration\ip.properties&quot; and update the IP range in WebSAMS at &quot;Security &gt; Configuration &gt; IP Address Configuration&quot;. Sent websams router config to user as request.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50244] How to do suspected dropout in WebSAMS?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50244</link>
<description>How to do suspected dropout in WebSAMS?</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103489">WPSII-50244</key>
<summary>How to do suspected dropout in WebSAMS?</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 16:14:38 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 19:07:22 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 2 Mar 2018 19:07:22 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We guided the user to set the default reasons at Attendance &gt; Setup &gt; Attendance Parameter. Then take the attendance record with 7 or more consecutive school days. Today attendance record must be included if he would like to generate the Attendance Form A today. The Suspected Dropout Indicator of absent reason must be &quot;Y&quot; at Code Management &gt; Maintenance &gt; Absent Reason. Then click the hyperlink of &quot;N&quot; in the column of &quot;Form A Completed&quot; at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [View], fill in and confirm the information of Form A, select the check-box of the specific student(s), click on the &quot;Send Data to CDS&quot; button, prepare and confirm it in the pop-up page. And then encrypt and send it out at EDB at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50243] How to change 3 days of Teacher Development Day to non-school days in WebSAMS?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50243</link>
<description>
How to change 3 days of Teacher Development Day to non-school days in WebSAMS?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103488">WPSII-50243</key>
<summary>
How to change 3 days of Teacher Development Day to non-school days in WebSAMS?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 15:59:21 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 17:01:21 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SCH</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 2 Mar 2018 17:00:20 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested that the user can manually add these 3 days at School Management &gt; School Calendar &gt; Setup &gt; Holiday &gt; [Batch Edit]. If the total number of holidays will be more than 90 days, he can take all students' Attendance Status to &quot;N.A.&quot; in these 3 school days at Attendance &gt; Maintenance &gt; By Student &gt; [Search] &gt; {Reg No.} &gt; [View].
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50242] Any cache files can be delete on D:\ of websams server?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50242</link>
<description>
Any cache files can be delete on D:\ of websams server?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103487">WPSII-50242</key>
<summary>
Any cache files can be delete on D:\ of websams server?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 15:55:15 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 5 Mar 2018 17:40:33 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>System</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Fri, 2 Mar 2018 16:08:48 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> We suggest user to clear the jboss cache:- <br/> D:\WebSAMS3.0\JBoss-as-7.1.1.Final\standalone\tmp\vfs\* <br/> D:\WebSAMS3.0\JBoss-as-7.1.1.Final\standalone\tmp\work\* <br/>
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50241] How to submit Attendance Form A to EDB after the field of "Form A Completed" has been changed to "Y" at Attendance > Suspected Dropout > Maintain Suspected Dropout > [View]?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50241</link>
<description>
How to submit Attendance Form A to EDB after the field of &quot;Form A Completed&quot; has been changed to &quot;Y&quot; at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [View]?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103486">WPSII-50241</key>

How to submit Attendance Form A to EDB after the field of "Form A Completed" has been changed to "Y" at Attendance > Suspected Dropout > Maintain Suspected Dropout > [View]?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>

<status id="6">Closed</status>

<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 2 Mar 2018 15:51:05 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to select the specific student(s) at the same web page, click the &quot;Send Data to CDS&quot; button, prepare and confirm it. And then encrypt and send it out to EDB at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50237] Submitted wrong absent date of suspected dropout student who has back to school already
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50237</link>
<description>
Submitted wrong absent date of suspected dropout student who has back to school already
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103482">WPSII-50237</key>
<summary>
Submitted wrong absent date of suspected dropout student who has back to school already
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 15:02:41 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 7 Mar 2018 12:11:20 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Fri, 2 Mar 2018 15:08:25 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> User cannot resend Att form A again. Informed user to contact Non-attendance Cases Team.
</comment>
<comment author="agent15" created="Fri, 2 Mar 2018 15:15:48 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> Informed user to contact Non-attendance Cases Team first, and check if they need change back websams time to process suspected dropout
</comment>
<comment author="agent15" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 11:52:03 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> User reported wrong character type error when input Chinese word in remark of ATT Form A. Guided user to copy chinese characters in notepad and copy to remark field or input english remark and try again.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 12:07:56 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that she still cannot save at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [View] &gt; {N}. <br/> <br/> We suggested her to enter any text of double-byte in the Remarks field even though any number and English character.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 12:09:00 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> After the user changed the number to double-byte, she has saved it successfully and agreed to close this case.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50235] How to depart a student who departed in last school year?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50235</link>
<description>
How to depart a student who departed in last school year?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103478">WPSII-50235</key>
<summary>
How to depart a student who departed in last school year?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 14:23:53 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 14:28:44 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Fri, 2 Mar 2018 14:28:30 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> The user confirmed that this student has no assessment and attendance record in the current school year. We suggested that he can click the &quot;Delete Bottom&quot; button in this student profile for removing the schooling record of 2017 at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling. Then, change the schooling status of 2016 to &quot;Departed&quot;. And then, submit the Student Form A of 2016 to EDB. <br/>
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50233] How to re-admit a student in WebSAMS who departed in the current school year?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50233</link>
<description>
How to re-admit a student in WebSAMS who departed in the current school year?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103474">WPSII-50233</key>
<summary>
How to re-admit a student in WebSAMS who departed in the current school year?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 11:43:55 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 14:32:15 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 2 Mar 2018 14:32:15 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested that the user can search this departed student profile at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Search Student. Then click the bottommost hyperlink of the first attended date at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling. To change the status from &quot;Departed&quot; to blank and save it. Then he can prepare and confirm the Form B at Student &gt; Data Communication &gt; Prepare Outgoing Data. And then encrypt and send it out in CDS module.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50228] Appeared an error message "E-40449 : Generate Form Ds - Student Particulars (Supplement) failed. The following student(s) is suspected dropout:..." as a user would like to add a suspected dropout student to the Student Form Ds. How to solve it?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50228</link>
<description>
Appeared an error message &quot;E-40449 : Generate Form Ds - Student Particulars (Supplement) failed. The following student(s) is suspected dropout:...&quot; as a user would like to add a suspected dropout student to the Student Form Ds. How to solve it?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103469">WPSII-50228</key>
<summary>
Appeared an error message "E-40449 : Generate Form Ds - Student Particulars (Supplement) failed. The following student(s) is suspected dropout:..." as a user would like to add a suspected dropout student to the Student Form Ds. How to solve it?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 10:36:44 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 15:38:29 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Fri, 2 Mar 2018 10:40:49 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> &nbsp;Explained to the user that any suspected dropout student is unable to be added in the Student Form Ds in WebSAMS. Thus the user needs to wait for him to return. Or he can consult with his EDB Liaison Officer
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50224] How to do suspected dropout in Websams
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50224</link>
<description>How to do suspected dropout in Websams</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103460">WPSII-50224</key>
<summary>How to do suspected dropout in Websams</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 16:46:43 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 16:53:37 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Thu, 1 Mar 2018 16:52:17 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> We guided the user to take the attendance record with 7 or more continuous school days. Today attendance record must be included if he would like to generate the Attendance Form A today. The Suspected Dropout Indicator of absent reason must be &quot;Y&quot; at Code Management &gt; Maintenance &gt; Absent Reason. Then, fill in the information of Form A at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout, click on the &quot;Send Data to CDS&quot; button and confirm it. And then, encrypt it and send it out to EDB at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message. <br/>
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50223] Failed to back up in the school's backup program on WebSAMS Server.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50223</link>
<description>
Failed to back up in the school's backup program on WebSAMS Server.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103459">WPSII-50223</key>
<summary>
Failed to back up in the school's backup program on WebSAMS Server.
</summary>
<type id="1">Problem</type>
<priority id="3">Medium</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 16:35:08 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 16:56:36 +0800 (CST)</updated>

Louie: <br/> The user can find the error in Windows Event Viewer about creating recovery point failure in the school's backup program. We suggested her to consult the school's software vendor or relative program supporting service.

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50216] How to compare subject with different name from last year at SLP > Institute Application > School Reference Report > Gen Academic Performance Info
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50216</link>
<description>
How to compare subject with different name from last year at SLP &gt; Institute Application &gt; School Reference Report &gt; Gen Academic Performance Info
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103452">WPSII-50216</key>
<summary>
How to compare subject with different name from last year at SLP > Institute Application > School Reference Report > Gen Academic Performance Info
</summary>
<type id="1">Problem</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 15:04:23 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Fri, 2 Mar 2018 15:38:56 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SLP</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Thu, 1 Mar 2018 15:05:25 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> Guided user to add both subjects at SLP &gt; Setup &gt; Subject Grouping, then select the group at SLP &gt; Institute Application &gt; School Reference Report &gt; Gen Academic Performance Info.
</comment>
</comments>
<customfields>
<customfield id="customfield_10015" key="com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.customfieldtypes:textfield">
<customfieldname>Contact Name</customfieldname>
<customfieldvalues>
<customfieldvalue>Mr. Tam</customfieldvalue>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50215] WebSAMS wrongly displays 3 times on each statutory holiday at Staff Deployment > Staff Leave / Absence > Statutory Holiday. The redundant entries cannot be deleted. This will affect the accuracy of the counting of the sick leave balance.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50215</link>
<description>
WebSAMS wrongly displays 3 times on each statutory holiday at Staff Deployment &gt; Staff Leave / Absence &gt; Statutory Holiday. The redundant entries cannot be deleted. This will affect the accuracy of the counting of the sick leave balance.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103451">WPSII-50215</key>
<summary>
WebSAMS wrongly displays 3 times on each statutory holiday at Staff Deployment > Staff Leave / Absence > Statutory Holiday. The redundant entries cannot be deleted. This will affect the accuracy of the counting of the sick leave balance.
</summary>
<type id="1">Problem</type>
<priority id="3">Medium</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="1">Fixed</resolution>
<assignee username="edithtung">Edith Tung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>

<updated>Fri, 9 Mar 2018 14:50:19 +0800 (CST)</updated>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50212] Unable to find any data at "Applied Learning > Application > Student Application (Mode 1 and Mode 2) > By Course" after the user has imported an APL parameter file at Applied Learning > Data Communication > Process Incoming Data.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50212</link>
<description>
Unable to find any data at &quot;Applied Learning &gt; Application &gt; Student Application (Mode 1 and Mode 2) &gt; By Course&quot; after the user has imported an APL parameter file at Applied Learning &gt; Data Communication &gt; Process Incoming Data.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103448">WPSII-50212</key>
<summary>
Unable to find any data at "Applied Learning > Application > Student Application (Mode 1 and Mode 2) > By Course" after the user has imported an APL parameter file at Applied Learning > Data Communication > Process Incoming Data.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 11:58:09 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 12:28:12 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>APL</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 1 Mar 2018 12:28:12 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to fill in the contact information in the current cohort and save it at Applied Learning &gt; Application &gt; Contact Information. Then submit Contact Information at Applied Learning &gt; Data Communication &gt; Prepare Outgoing Data. After that he can find the data at Applied Learning &gt; Application &gt; Student Application (Mode 1 and Mode 2) &gt; By Course.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50211] Appeared an error message "E-21066 : Academic Result Retrieved From/Assessment/HKDSE subject of the following..." after the user clicked the Generate button at SLP > Institute Application > School Reference Report > Gen Academic Performance Info.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50211</link>
<description>
Appeared an error message &quot;E-21066 : Academic Result Retrieved From/Assessment/HKDSE subject of the following...&quot; after the user clicked the Generate button at SLP &gt; Institute Application &gt; School Reference Report &gt; Gen Academic Performance Info.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103447">WPSII-50211</key>
<summary>
Appeared an error message "E-21066 : Academic Result Retrieved From/Assessment/HKDSE subject of the following..." after the user clicked the Generate button at SLP > Institute Application > School Reference Report > Gen Academic Performance Info.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 11:52:12 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 11:56:52 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>SLP</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Thu, 1 Mar 2018 11:56:41 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> The user have not choose Academic Result Retrieved From and Assessment to Inapplicable, it will let the WebSAMS prompt up the error as below. E-21066 : Academic Result Retrieved From/Assessment/HKDSE subject of the following WebSAMS subject(s)/component(s) is blank.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50210] How to add a new staff into an existing result set of Timetabling?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50210</link>
<description>
How to add a new staff into an existing result set of Timetabling?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103446">WPSII-50210</key>
<summary>
How to add a new staff into an existing result set of Timetabling?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 11:49:12 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Thu, 1 Mar 2018 12:18:17 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>TTL</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 1 Mar 2018 12:16:31 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user would like to replace a departed teacher in the result set with the new teacher. We suggested him to search the new teacher staff profile at Staff &gt; Profile. Then select the departed staff name in the drop-down box of Replacement and save it at Staff &gt; Profile &gt; Appointment.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Thu, 1 Mar 2018 12:17:31 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> Can user also replace a virtual staff in result set? <br/> <br/> Yes, he can.
</comment>
</comments>

[WPSII-50204] How to add the early Chinese New Year holidays for prevention of influenza in WebSAMS?
</title>

</description>
<environment/>

</summary>

<status id="6">Closed</status>

<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 17:59:03 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 18:02:19 +0800 (CST)</updated>

<comment author="agent13" created="Wed, 28 Feb 2018 18:01:54 +0800 (CST)" level="">
We suggested that the user can add the holiday at School Management &gt; School Calendar &gt; Setup &gt; Holiday. If the total no. of school holidays is more than 90 days, he can consult the SLO. <br/>
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50201] A school has changed new ISP. What thing does user need to do in WebSAMS?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50201</link>
<description>
A school has changed new ISP. What thing does user need to do in WebSAMS?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103434">WPSII-50201</key>
<summary>
A school has changed new ISP. What thing does user need to do in WebSAMS?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 17:36:29 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 17:37:58 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>System</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Wed, 28 Feb 2018 17:37:40 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> 1. We suggested that the user needs to update the real IP address of WebSAMS domain name in the hosting record by ISP or the school's hosting company; <br/> 2. He needs to update the NAT record in the school's firewall for the real IP address of WebSAMS domain name; <br/> 3. If the user entered the IP address of ISP provided DNS Server which is not for public, he also needs to update it on WebSAMS HTTP Server; <br/> 4. Contact the SLO to register the new IP address of the school's ISP Internet service.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50200] How to do suspected dropout in Websams
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50200</link>
<description>How to do suspected dropout in Websams</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103433">WPSII-50200</key>
<summary>How to do suspected dropout in Websams</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</assignee>
<reporter username="agent13">Vincent Tsui</reporter>
<created>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 17:32:25 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 17:34:42 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent13" created="Wed, 28 Feb 2018 17:32:40 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Vincent: <br/> We guided the user to take the attendance record with 7 or more continuous school days. Today attendance record must be included if he would like to generate the Attendance Form A today. The Suspected Dropout Indicator of absent reason must be &quot;Y&quot; at Code Management &gt; Maintenance &gt; Absent Reason. Then, fill in the information of Form A at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout, click on the &quot;Send Data to CDS&quot; button and confirm it. And then, encrypt it and send it out to EDB at CDS &gt; Outgoing Message &gt; Maintain Message.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50198] How to adjust a student's registration no. in WebSAMS?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50198</link>
<description>
How to adjust a student's registration no. in WebSAMS?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103431">WPSII-50198</key>
<summary>
How to adjust a student's registration no. in WebSAMS?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 16:38:16 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 18:26:11 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 28 Feb 2018 18:26:11 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied to the user that student reg. no. cannot be modified in WebSAMS once it has been admitted. Due to the new admitted students in the middle of the school year 2017, he still has not any data in other modules. We suggested him to depart him, submit Student Form A and delete his student profile at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Particulars. Then he can admit him again with the new reg no. And then submit Student Form B.
</comment>
</comments>

<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 28 Feb 2018 18:13:19 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user can import the current final result set of the new effective period which start date is 1-Mar-2018 to the new extended date. After he imported it at Staff Deployment &gt; Data Capture, we suggest changing the effective period of the same data set to be from 1-Sep-2017 to the new extended date.
</comment>

Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to do suspected dropout and submit Attendance Form A at &quot;Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [View]&quot; instead of Student module.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 28 Feb 2018 16:37:44 +0800 (CST)" level="">Louie: <br/> We repeated the above comment to him.</comment>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50190] Can user submit Attendance Form A to EDB if a student has 5 absent days only?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50190</link>
<description>
Can user submit Attendance Form A to EDB if a student has 5 absent days only?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103423">WPSII-50190</key>
<summary>
Can user submit Attendance Form A to EDB if a student has 5 absent days only?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 15:04:35 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 15:12:30 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 28 Feb 2018 15:12:30 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied to the user that WebSAMS can manually add a suspected dropout record at least today to be absent at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [View]. However, it is out of the EDB policy without 7 absent days. We suggested her to consult EDB Officer of NACT before submit this Attendance Form A.
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50189] Addendum (Chi) data on some students lost at Award & Punishment > Maintenance > By Student > [Search] > {Reg No.} > {Event}.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50189</link>
<description>

</description>
<environment/>

[WPSII-50187] Unable to connect WebSAMS database on an ITED workstation.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50187</link>
<description>
Unable to connect WebSAMS database on an ITED workstation.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103417">WPSII-50187</key>
<summary>
Unable to connect WebSAMS database on an ITED workstation.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 12:38:10 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Wed, 28 Feb 2018 12:58:01 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>System</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 28 Feb 2018 12:58:01 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied to the user that any ITED workstation cannot connect to WebSAMS database by ODBC connection. It is normal. We suggested him to use any WebSAMS workstation or connect his workstation into WebSAMS LAN segment.
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50177] Unable to find a suspected dropout student at Attendance > Suspected Dropout > Maintain Suspected Dropout > [View].
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50177</link>
<description>
Unable to find a suspected dropout student at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [View].
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103406">WPSII-50177</key>
<summary>
Unable to find a suspected dropout student at Attendance > Suspected Dropout > Maintain Suspected Dropout > [View].
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 15:56:30 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 19:59:06 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ATT</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 27 Feb 2018 19:59:06 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to change the Suspected Dropout Indicator of the specific absent reason(s) from &quot;N&quot; to &quot;Y&quot; and save it at Code Management &gt; Maintenance &gt; Absent Reason. Then she can find this student at Attendance &gt; Suspected Dropout &gt; Maintain Suspected Dropout &gt; [View].
</comment>
</comments>

<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 15:14:04 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 19:49:48 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 27 Feb 2018 19:49:48 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested that the user can search this departed student profile at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Search Student. Then click the bottommost hyperlink of the first attended date at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling. To change the status from &quot;Departed&quot; to blank and save it. Then he can prepare and confirm the Form B at Student &gt; Data Communication &gt; Prepare Outgoing Data. And then encrypt and send it out in CDS module. <br/>
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50173] Appeared an error message "E-40349 : Last Day of attendance must be after admission date and 1st date of attendance." after the user clicked the Save button at Student > Profile > Schooling > {Departed}.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50173</link>
<description>
Appeared an error message &quot;E-40349 : Last Day of attendance must be after admission date and 1st date of attendance.&quot; after the user clicked the Save button at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling &gt; {Departed}. <br/> <br/> The Affected Student Info: - <br/> Absent Date: From 2-Nov-2017 to 30-Nov-2017 <br/> Submission Date of First Attendance Form A: 13-Nov-2017 <br/> Return Date: 1-Dec-2017 <br/> Submission Date of Attendance Form B: 1-Dec-2017 <br/> Submission Date of Second Attendance Form A: 12-Dec-2017 <br/> Transferred Date to Other Class: 22-Jan-2018
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103400">WPSII-50173</key>
<summary>
Appeared an error message "E-40349 : Last Day of attendance must be after admission date and 1st date of attendance." after the user clicked the Save button at Student > Profile > Schooling > {Departed}.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 14:57:35 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 19:46:51 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 27 Feb 2018 19:46:51 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that the student has never returned to the school after the 2nd period of suspected dropout. And he has no record in other modules after he was transferred to the other class. We suggested that she can delete his bottommost transferred schooling record in his student profile at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling. After that the first attended schooling record of the current school year is 1-Sep-2017, the last attendance date will not be later than the 1st attendance date.
</comment>
</comments>

<description>

</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Fri, 2 Mar 2018 12:53:02 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We have requested Email address to the user for sending the solution to him. Waiting for his reply.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 6 Mar 2018 20:09:50 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We sent a fixed WebSAMS application file &quot;websams.ear&quot; to the user. After he replaced with it on WebSAMS Server, this problem will be solved. Or he can wait for the next build of WebSAMS version.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Wed, 7 Mar 2018 17:41:57 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that the problem has been solved. He agreed to close this case.

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50168] Appeared an error message "E-44233 : Invalid EVENT CODE" in all punishment records of the error report at Award & Punishment > Import > [Import] > [View Error Report].
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50168</link>
<description>
Appeared an error message &quot;E-44233 : Invalid EVENT CODE&quot; in all punishment records of the error report at Award &amp; Punishment &gt; Import &gt; [Import] &gt; [View Error Report].
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103393">WPSII-50168</key>
<summary>
Appeared an error message "E-44233 : Invalid EVENT CODE" in all punishment records of the error report at Award & Punishment > Import > [Import] > [View Error Report].
</summary>
<type id="1">Problem</type>
<priority id="3">Medium</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 11:54:51 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 16:03:14 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ANP</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 27 Feb 2018 12:43:43 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> In according to the user's import file, the &quot;ANP TYPE&quot; is &quot;P&quot; (Punishment). He should copy all the records from the award field &quot;DESCRIPTION (CHI) (Award)&quot;, paste to the punishment field &quot;DESCRIPTION (ENG) (Award)/ DESCRIPTION (Punishment)&quot; and save it in Excel before import it to WebSAMS again.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 27 Feb 2018 12:46:15 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We replied the above comment to the user by Email.
</comment>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 27 Feb 2018 16:03:14 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user claimed that the problem has been solved. He agreed to close this case.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50167] A user had ever changed subject MOI of a cross-class subject from Chinese to English on a student. He found WebSAMS double counting on this subject now. How to solve it?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50167</link>
<description>
A user had ever changed subject MOI of a cross-class subject from Chinese to English on a student. He found WebSAMS double counting on this subject now. How to solve it?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103392">WPSII-50167</key>
<summary>
A user had ever changed subject MOI of a cross-class subject from Chinese to English on a student. He found WebSAMS double counting on this subject now. How to solve it?
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 11:48:09 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 17:41:44 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Tue, 27 Feb 2018 17:41:44 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to follow the steps as below: - <br/> 1. Change the cross-class subject sub-group back to the MOI of Chinese on that student and save it at Student &gt; Subject Setup &gt; [Search]; <br/> 2. Delete this subject score of him and save it at Assessment &gt; Data Entry &gt; Score &amp; Grade; <br/> 3. Execute consolidation of the specific class level at Assessment &gt; Consolidation &gt; Consolidation; <br/> 4. Restore the cross-class subject sub-group to the MOI of English on that student and save it at Student &gt; Subject Setup &gt; [Search]; <br/> 5. Execute consolidation of the specific class level at Assessment &gt; Consolidation &gt; Consolidation. <br/>
</comment>
</comments>

<title>
[WPSII-50161] How to re-admit a departed student who departed in the same school year?
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50161</link>
<description>
How to re-admit a departed student who departed in the same school year?
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103386">WPSII-50161</key>

</summary>

<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>
<reporter username="agent15">Andrew Leung</reporter>
<created>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 10:15:24 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Tue, 27 Feb 2018 10:16:26 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent15" created="Tue, 27 Feb 2018 10:16:19 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> &nbsp;We guided the user to search this departed student profile at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Search Student. Then, clicked the bottom hyperlink of the first attended date at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling. To change the status from &quot;Departed&quot; to blank and saved it.
</comment>
</comments>

<updated>Mon, 26 Feb 2018 19:46:50 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 26 Feb 2018 19:46:50 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> We suggested the user to search this student by &quot;All&quot; school years at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Search Student. Then click the Re-admit button in this student profile at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Particulars, fill in all the information of re-admission and save it. And then submit the Form B to EDB at Student &gt; Data Communication &gt; Prepare Outgoing Data.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50156] Appeared an error message "E-40348: The last day of attendance should be within selected school year and term" after the user departed a student and clicked the Save button at Student > Profile > Schooling.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50156</link>
<description>
Appeared an error message &quot;E-40348: The last day of attendance should be within selected school year and term&quot; after the user departed a student and clicked the Save button at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103380">WPSII-50156</key>
<summary>
Appeared an error message "E-40348: The last day of attendance should be within selected school year and term" after the user departed a student and clicked the Save button at Student > Profile > Schooling.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="4">Low</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Mon, 26 Feb 2018 16:45:07 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 26 Feb 2018 19:15:34 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>STU</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 26 Feb 2018 19:15:34 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The user selected the Last Day of Attendance on this departed student to &quot;25-Jan-2018&quot; and selected the Departure Term to &quot;T2&quot; at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling &gt; {Departed}. However, the End Date of T1 of the specific class level is earlier than 25-Jan-2018 and the Start Date of T2 is later than &quot;25-Jan-2018&quot; at School Management &gt; Calendar &gt; Setup &gt; Term Information. Thus we suggested him to change the End Date or Start Date of T1 or T2 to be consecutive without any gap in between the both terms and save it. Then depart this student again at Student &gt; Profile &gt; Schooling &gt; {Departed}.
</comment>
</comments>

<item>
<title>
[WPSII-50151] Unable to find any Cross Class Sub-Group after the user selected the radio button of "By Cross Class Subject" and selected Secondary 6 at Assessment > Data Entry > Score & Grade.
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50151</link>
<description>
Unable to find any Cross Class Sub-Group after the user selected the radio button of &quot;By Cross Class Subject&quot; and selected Secondary 6 at Assessment &gt; Data Entry &gt; Score &amp; Grade.
</description>
<environment/>
<key id="103375">WPSII-50151</key>
<summary>
Unable to find any Cross Class Sub-Group after the user selected the radio button of "By Cross Class Subject" and selected Secondary 6 at Assessment > Data Entry > Score & Grade.
</summary>
<type id="6">Enquiry</type>
<priority id="3">Medium</priority>
<status id="6">Closed</status>
<resolution id="9">Clarified</resolution>
<assignee username="agent2">Agent 2</assignee>
<reporter username="agent2">Agent 2</reporter>
<created>Mon, 26 Feb 2018 14:32:31 +0800 (CST)</created>
<updated>Mon, 26 Feb 2018 15:37:04 +0800 (CST)</updated>
<component>ASR</component>
<comments>
<comment author="agent2" created="Mon, 26 Feb 2018 15:37:04 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Louie: <br/> The Vice Principal claimed that another teacher is assigned to the specific Cross-Class Subject group of this subject &quot;Geography&quot; and attached with S5 and S6. She should teach S5 only and the Vice Principal teacher S6 in fact. We suggested the user to follow the steps as below: - <br/> <br/> 1. Make sure no user to enter subject score; <br/> 2. Reset School Information at School Management &gt; Confirm School Information; <br/> 3. Unselect all S6 classes in this cross-class subject group and save it at School Management &gt; Group for Cross-Class Subject &gt; Class Attached; <br/> 4. Create a new cross-class subject group for this subject and attached only S6 classes; <br/> 5. Create a cross-class subject sub-group at School Management &gt; Group for Cross-Class Subject &gt; Sub-Group; <br/> 6. Assign the Vice Principal name in this sub group; <br/> 7. Assign the specific students at Student &gt; Subject Setup &gt; [Search]; <br/> 8. Confirm School Information at School Management &gt; Confirm School Information.
</comment>
</comments>

Andrew: <br/> User change the domain name and informed user to request new ecert from SLO and Copy the school cert into the following directory <br/> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;/etc/apache2/ssl.key/[SUID]SvrKey.key <br/> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;/etc/apache2/ssl.crt/[SUID]SvrCert.pem

<title>
[WPSII-50142] Unable to find any A/G5xxx Ledger Code at [S-FCS06-01] FMP > Common Setup > Chart of Account Maintenance > Sub-Ledger
</title>
<link>http://helpdesk.hk.ncs-i.com/browse/WPSII-50142</link>
<description>

</description>

<summary>

<comment author="agent15" created="Fri, 23 Feb 2018 09:57:39 +0800 (CST)" level="">
Andrew: <br/> We suggested the user to open the port 80 and 443 (7010 is option) on the new firewall for WebSAMS and update the NAT port forward for WebSAMS URL.
</comment>
</comments>

</title>

<assignee username="agent15">Andrew Leung</assignee>

<created>Thu, 22 Feb 2018 12:46:47 +0800 (CST)</created>

<component>System</component>
